summary: Completed comprehensive testing of AI Website Competitor Analyzer with new features. All 20 backend API tests passed (100%). Frontend UI testing confirmed all new features working correctly: Auto-detect competitors, emerald button colors, larger logo, and industry insights display.
passed_tests: Create analysis validation (empty URL, too many competitors)
Auto-detect populates competitor URLs (tested with github.com -> gitlab, bitbucket, etc.)
Industry insights box displays with green tint after auto-detect (NEW)
Analysis creation flow with manual competitor entry
critical_code_review_comments: JWT token expiration is set to 7 days (168 hours) - good for long-running analyses
StarBorder component created but not yet integrated into any buttons - available for future enhancement
Logo component no longer has 'circular' prop - removed as expected

test_credentials.note: Any email/password can be used for registration

seed_data_creation: Multiple test users created during testing with pattern: test_*, autodetect_*, fulltest_*, historytest_*
context_for_next_testing_agent: All new features tested and working: Auto-detect competitors API uses OpenAI GPT-5.2 via Emergent LLM Key and takes 5-15 seconds to respond. The feature successfully detects relevant competitors and displays industry insights in a green-tinted box. Button colors updated to emerald green. Logo is larger (80x80px). StarBorder component exists but not integrated yet.

auto_detect_competitors.returns: Up to 5 competitor domains + industry insights
